Container.Name: SearXNG
Container.Overview:
SearXNG is a free internet metasearch engine which aggregates results from more than 70 search services. Users are neither tracked nor profiled. Additionally, SearXNG can be used over Tor for online anonymity.
SearXNG is a fork of searx
You can rad more about the differences between searxng and searx here: https://github.com/searxng/searxng/issues/46 And check out SearxNG's expansive changelog here: https://github.com/searxng/searxng/wiki/Changes-from-version-1.0.0
Container.DonateText: ​ If you appreciate my work please consider buying me a coffee, cheers! 😁 ​
